## Example presentation 1

## NHANES Sexuality {.scrollable}

Correlation does not imply causation!
```{r, tidy =FALSE}
nh_tbl <- as_tibble(NHANES) %>% filter(!is.na(SexOrientation))
nh_tbl %>% ggplot(aes(SexOrientation)) + geom_bar(fill="blue")
nh_tbl %>% ggplot(aes(SexOrientation)) + geom_bar(aes(fill=Gender),position="dodge")
nh_tbl %>% filter(SexOrientation!="Heterosexual") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(SexOrientation,fill=Gender)) + geom_bar(position="dodge")
nh_tbl %>% filter(SexOrientation!="Heterosexual") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(SexOrientation,fill=SameSex)) + geom_bar(position="dodge")
nh_tbl %>% filter(!is.na(SameSex), SexOrientation=="Heterosexual",SameSex == "Yes") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(Gender,fill=Gender)) + geom_bar() + 
  labs(title = "Identify as Heterosexual with Same Sex Experience") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))
```
